techmeme.title: Meta shares its research on Meta 3D Gen, a system that creates high-quality 3D assets from text descriptions in less than a minute (Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat)
Sources: Apple will get an observer role on OpenAI's board, with Phil Schiller chosen for the position, as part of their partnership announced last month (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Responding to criticism, Figma's CTO says the Make Design feature is "powered by off-the-shelf models and a bespoke design system that we commissioned" (Jay Peters/The Verge)
A US judge temporarily blocked a new Mississippi law that would require age verification for all and parental consent for teens to join some social networks (Lauren Feiner/The Verge)
Meta says it will lift its ban on the word "shaheed", or "martyr" in English, after its oversight board's year-long review found the approach to be "overbroad" (Jaspreet Singh/Reuters)
